reviews.review:
TL;DR:
You would not buy unfinished house and you would not buy unfinished car. So you should not buy this unfinished game...

This game, even though released, is still in hard beta state. Not recommending to buy for full price and not unless you can gain levels or play online games with friends

Nice copy of Dead Realm and G-mod's Hide & Seek and Murder.
Pros:
[list]
[*]Nice graphics
[*]Its fun playing with friends
[/list]

Cons:
[list]
[*]Unable to configure brightness in game
[*]Unable to change ANY controls in game
[*]Unable to turn off music in game
[*]No in-game text chat for survivor group
[*]No in-game voice chat for survivor group
[*]This being a "CO-OP" game means you cannot level up with your friends
[*]This being a "CO-OP" game means you must level up online, where everyone plays for himself
[*]You can rank up only online, which means you will de-rank sooner than you will rank up
[*]Match making system is weird - matches level 1, rank 20 killer (the lowest possible) with level 35 rank 1 prestige+ survivors
[*]Only the host is killer - you cannot switch in lobby, so if you play with your friends every 10 minutes someone else makes new lobby and sends out invitations
[*]If you don't know the maps well its hard to juke the Killer
[*]If you are a killer and 1-2 survivors are juking you there is no chance to get them - assume 30+ min game
[*]Levelling up in this game is weird
[/list]
This is a exciting game which is full  with gay.    --  . --

Hallo zusammen,

Dead By Daylight ist ein super gutes Spiel, die Idee ist Klasse und die Atmosphäre ist der Wahnsinn.

Leider muss ich derzeit JEDEM vom Kauf abraten, da Bugs dieses Spiel unspielbar machen.

Ich spiele im Moment den Killer und habe in jedem einzelnen Game mit folgendem Bug zu kämpfen:
Ich nehme einen Überlebenden auf die Schulter und ab dem Moment freezt mein Charakter und der Überlebende kann sich auch nicht freiwiggln. Was passiert also? Die Überlebenden beenden das Game bequem und der Killer kann nicht mal dabei zusehen, da er sich nicht bewegen kann...

Und dieser Bug ist seit einer Woche nicht gefixxt? Wow!

Die Entwickler wollen sehr viel, Hut ab! Haben das Game meiner Meinung nach aber viel zu früh aus der Beta entlassen.

Wartet lieber noch 2-3 Monate.
Крутая игра!
好玩的游戏，期待后续跟新，求汉化！！！

Das Spiel an sich ist ganz gut aber ich würde es dennoch nicht weiter empfehlen. Man bezahlt ne Menge Geld und um Endeffekt funktioniert es nicht richtig. Es ist schwierig eine Lobby zu finden denn man fliegt ständig raus oder das Spiel hängt sich indirekt auf und man muss es neu starten. Außerdem kann man dieses Spiel nur mit Direct 11 oder höher spielen, hat man Direct 10 kann man das Spiel zwar kaufen, allerdings nicht spielen. Klarer Daumen runter. Ich hoffe dieses Spiel wird noch ein wenig überarbeitet, momentan ist es sein Geld in meinen Augen nicht wert.

Experience varies.
As a good survivor you're going to experience dread, tension, hopelessness and bravery.
As a bad survivor you're going to be having many staring matches with the killer from an uncomfortable vantage point.
As a good killer you're going to get to feel the power of being a dangerous predator out for blood.
As a bad killer... just watch a scooby doo chase scene and imagine yourself as the bad guy.
10 вылетов маньяков из 10
这款游戏刚入手时会让你倍感着迷，但是不得不说游戏体验非常差。玩的越久越窝心。各种bug多到你砸键盘。匹配机制更是一塌糊涂，不是加入失败就是等待。好不容易开了一局，还是屠夫主机不是卡网速就是跳窗bug，拔线惩罚形同虚设，对于老司机根本毫无作用只是坑了屠夫。外挂改档汉化一竿子打死，改封的封不干净误封倒是不少，61块钱当给开发商众筹买药了。毕竟这病不好治。

Геймплейная составляющая - побегать, починить генераторы, убежать, на крайняк - убежать в люк. Жаловаться на геймплей не стоит. Ведь во всех играх геймплей можно сказать однообразен. Ходить стрелять на одних и тех же локациях, выполнять одну и ту же задачу.
Геймплей 8/10. Не помешало бы добавить пару других эскейпов.

I read somewhere, on I believe Kotaku, that there were developers making a Friday the 13th game that's just like this. Hopefully these are those developers, or that they collaborate, because this game is really fun! 

It's scary, intense, gripping, frustrating, and after a round, a bit hilarious.  I recommend buying and playing this game. It's not done yet! That's what makes it so promising. 

However right now I'm just writing this review to get my one or two cons out there in hopes the developers read it: The killers are OP, or the survivors suck! And I say it's both. The Trapper just hangs someone on a meat hook and then places a bear trap in front of them. Then waits it out for another victim to attempt a rescue. It's so cheap. 

And the attack range of all the killers is a bit much. Even if you run to the side and behind them to try and avoid the swing, you get injured. At some point it's not realistic for the killer while the game is 100% realistic for the victims. AND if memory serves me right, the killers can still attack while carrying somebody! They should be using both hands to carry me if I'm wiggling around on their shoulders trying to escape their clutches.

And that flashlight is useless af. All the killer has to do is face the opposite direction and run, and the flashlight is dead. Really? That's the only defensive item the victims have? Please add some more defensive items. Maybe a bat or something. I know victims in horror movies fight back from time to time; they ain't all helpless. 

Thank you!

Fora esse problemas, não tenho nada a reclamar e amei o jogo

Amazing game

I felt compelled to write a review for this game. Unfortunately it's not going to be a pleasant one.

This game was clearly released unfinished. It more than lacks in several areas that should have been polished before relase - here are the most glaring:

1) The biggest glaring issue: No partying with friends unless it's a private unranked game. This wouldn;t be so bad if the game wasn't fun only when you had a full party of 5 playing unranked, otherwise it's a boring mess. In the ranked games you are paired with complete randoms all of whom play with a Call of Duty sense of mind that they can solo the world and not bother lifting a finger trying to save a teammate. I have died countless times sacrificing myself to save a teammate or throw myself in the way of a killer and blind him only to havve myself get in a pinch later and everyone scattering to the wind.
2) No in-game chat. You might say this one was done on purpose, but when the game has a MAJOR cripple as stated in point #1 this is a necessity. They could have at least done it creatively - in-game walkie talkies that give off a noise range that the killer can here when he's close - easy to implement and effective until they fix the multiplayer partying.
3) Completely broken lobbying. This is probably one of the most frustrating issues with this game. You will spend a good few minutes just trying to get the game to ALLOW YOU TO PLAY. You click on 'Find a lobby' and the game responds with 'Failed'. Rinse and repeat a few times and then the game starts to act like it's loading to a lobby and then... you're mysteriously backk at the 'Find a lobby' screen? Click on 'Find a lobby' again and you might finally get taken in to a game with players! Everyone clicks on ready... game countdown has begun... grip your seats for a fun ride... WAIT, LOBBY CRASHED! Yeah, do that three or four times in a row and your patience for this game will have been destroyed.

It's unfortunate that this game is plagued with so many issues. It seriously is a fun game and it shines when everything works the way it's supposed to and you don't get stuck with brain-dead teammates. Unfortunately though it seems like the Developers heard that the Friday the 13th game was fundraised and decided to make a mad dash to release this - bugs and all.

Final Verdict: 4/10 with the potential of a 7/10 game. Wait for it to be patched or go on a heavy sale before wasting your well earned money.

(UPDATE: 7/24/2016)
So they released the new update to allow team survivor grouping. While it does make the game slightly better - the glitches this game has are simply too numerous.

If you have a group less than 4 prepare to maybe play 1 game every 20 tries, because apparently it's too hard for this game to find a working lobby. Think it might be beter with  people? Nope! It works once in every 10~15 tries.

As far as the match making goes - can someone please explain to me the point of ranks? Our group is a mix of 18~20 ranks and we are facing killers that are rank 1? The perks will make it completely one sided that it's boring.

I have to rate this an abysmal 3/10 now. It has dropped a point due to the fact that two major patches have been released since I first rated this and neither improved on their incomplete design.

Un JUEGAZO, y para los que piensen que tiene pocas horas de juego... Yo tengo 49 hs practicamente con un solo personaje  y son 4. Ahora cambie de personaje y tengo para un rato más, ya que cada personaje tiene 3 habilidades únicas y las demás son comunes, y sin contar partidas como asesino! También falta que agreguen más mapas, asesinos, y supervivientes!

EDIT: Sigue siendo un juegazo y lo recomiendo, pero el juego se esta tornando cada vez peor. Los desarrolladores sacan dlcs pagos, en realidad asesinos y supervivientes pagos; los asesinos pagos estan + chetados y los supervivientes hacen agua...
Los mapas que sacan son buenos y gratis, pero generalmente en la partida salen los clásicos. Ej: Habré jugado 3 veces el mapa de la bruja.
Los asesinos tienen cada vez mas posibilidades que los supervivientes; agregaron que puedan dañar generadores, que los ganchos se regeneren, habilidades(maleficios) muy op, implementando la fatiga de los supervivientes, que los S reparen mas lento, etc.
El Matchmaking es un ASCO, a veces funciona bien pero por lo general es lento, y cada vez menos gente juega.
Cada partida se descubre un bug nuevo, desde bugs graciosos, hasta bugs que terminan arruinando la partida como no poder utilizar botones de interacción, asesino bugeado en alguna zona del mapa, etc, etc, etc. Los desarrolladores en vez de sacar dlcs pagos deberían enfocarse en arreglar los errores de un juego de 20 dolares...
En resumen, yo lo recomiendo, es un juegazo, te vas a divertir y jugar mucho, al principio los bugs y el MM no molestan ya que el juego entretiene mucho y mas con amigos, pero ya con horas como las mias termina siendo una verdadera mierda; y encima si siguen sacando cosas pagas en vez de mejorar su juego van a perder mas gente todavia.
SO MANY GLITCHS But when you get past that and have a game without any it is extremly fucking fun

I really liked this game at first.  I play mostly the killer, and it's fun chasing down the survivors and trying to herd them towards traps or predict which way they're running so you can cut them off.  It's a really fun game of cat and mouse; however, the ranking/point system ruins the game, or at least how the system currently works (ranking and leveling are two separate systems btw, but they are both dependent on points).  

The ranking system is currently based on points which you earn by completing certain actions in the game, such as finding a survivor, chasing them, attacking them, hooking them, etc.  However, if you're TOO GOOD at this game and kill all the survivors too quickly, that means you wouldn't have earned enough points to rank up.  Instead, you would rank down for being TOO GOOD. Same with being a survivor, if you escape too quickly, you'll rank down from not earning enough points.  Also, points are needed to level up and gain new skills.

So a work around that I've discovered, is as a killer, I can kill three of the survivors and then team up with the last remaining survivor, granted they're smart enough to figure out my intentions.  I will pick up a survivor, carry them to the generator and let them wiggle free.  Then they can start repairing the generator and I'll grab him while repairing to gain more points.  After I max my grab points, I'll play a game of hide and seek (suvivor found and chase points) where I'll run away from the suvivor while they're repairing and run back towards them.  After they're done with that generator, I'll then lay down traps (as the trapper) and they'll walk into it, get caught, I'll pick them up, and off to the next generator we go!

And all the while the suvivor will get repair points, skill check points, and boldness points from me being their friend.  After we're done repairing all the generators, I'll carry them to the exit gate and let them repair it and escape through the gates.  And everytime, a tear drips from my deformed eyes as I wave my machete good bye to my new found friend.

This is how you can farm points.  Both the killer and suvivor can both get up to 20,000 points a game by doing this.

So instead of being a suvival horror game, it becomes a game about a boy/girl and his/her misunderstood monster friend.

The current ranking/point system defeats the concept of the game.  Instead of playing a game of cat and mouse, hunter and prey, killer and victim, it's much more efficient in terms of ranking/leveling up to work together to farm points.  This ruins the fun of the game.  Playing the game the way it was meant to be played is just too inefficient.  It would take forever to get enough points to level up, and you'll be stuck at the lowest rank forever.

The upside; however, is that you can still rank up/level up even if you lose the match provided you gained enough points.  But if you lost the match, you probably didn't get enough points to rank up/level up anyways.

really fun game, but it just isn't worth $$ right now. very buggy. screen often locks up whilst trying to find matches, forcing me to reboot the game. And you can forget playing with friends unless you ALWAYS have 5 people on for a private match. there is CURRENTLY no public matchmaking with your friends. you pretty much have to click join at the same time and hope for the best. I just had to back out of 34 matches and still have not found my friend. so I quit the game and am writing this review. like I said... very VERY fun, but I wish I had waited until the devs do some more work on it before I made this purchase.

Alright, I previously had a downovte because this game was increadibly hard to play and really not fun. They've added quite a few new mechanics to change how the game is played, like adding more pallets, and if someone runs through a window too often (which I personally haven't done yet), the entity will block the window off. Not to mention, they also have a mechanic where you can give feedback about players, which I really like and find nifty. All of these make the game way more enjoyable, and I'm glad the Devs have been working so hard to make it more balanced.

O jogo desde o lançamento teve somente 1 atualização, a qual adicionou a possibilidade de procurar jogos mesmo com times incompletos, isso ajudou bastante, mas ainda tem 2 problemas:
1-O fato de que não é possivel ser o assassino na premade nova, somente sobreviventes, o que deixa o jogo mais limitado
2-O jogo ainda está incompleto, não tem nenhum mecanismo de "report" a outros jogadores por hack ou coisas do genero (Já cansei de ver assassino acertando golpe depois de eu ter pulado uma janela, ou eu me esconder em um armario sem o assassino estar por perto, e de repente ele vir até mim sem nenhuma forma de poder me localizar)....

Fora isso o jogo está jogavel, porém ainda não recomendo se quer jogar com os amigos, pois o jogo ainda está em "pedaços"



edit: Voltei a jogar essa ***** depois de mais de 3 anos, e minha análise resumida é: não adianta colocar um monte de conteúdo adicional daora, se a vc nn consegue jogar a porcaria do jogo, em 5 partidas, caiu o servidor em 3 delas, e ainda por cima tomo punição de tempo por desconexão; ou seja, a desenvolvedora ta ganhando rios de dinheiro com as dlcs, e não investem em um servidor normal, e isso a MAIS DE 3 ANOS DE JOGO, simplesmente ridículo, não recomendo a ninguém
GOOD

I purchased this game so that I could play with my brother, only to find out that you can't play with friends unless you have 5 people. I honeslty can't understand why any company would release a game like that in this day and age. Esspecially a game that seems like it's MADE for co-op play. It would be like Left 4 Dead not having the option to play with friends unless you have a full party, absolutley absurd, immeadiately refunded this game.
有的bug请尽快修复，开挂的要永久封号，优点就是可玩性很高，画面和氛围感不错

Game has a ton of potential. Devs are listening to feedback and making adjustments. Current balance is pretty good, even taking window cheese into consideration. Additional modes (survive with friends, 2v8 or other unnannounced) will make this game shine. Great gameplay on both sides of the coin. For 20$, its definately worth a buy.
This game is sick, not perfect by on it's way to being so.

Complete Re-Edit.
This game is fun. 
But the people suck.
Killers are monsters and survivors are savages.
But in a more descriptive sense, survivors will never ever do anything until someone gets downed. Not a single generator, just complete silence. Sometimes when I die, I wonder if the rest make it out alive. This is not a waiting game people, get those generators plz.
I also get caught in terrible situations where killers will be near me, look left, look right, run off. Then run straight after me. Which is kind of confusing. 
You cant outrun/ outsmart killers, or really ever get out from their hooks, (which most of the time they camp) people dont really like to save eachother either, which I understand. Most of the time, 2+ people will get hit or downed trying to save you, and most of the time, you dont get saved. 
I feel it really adds to the sense of being a helpless victim.
There are the good games where you save a person or two. Or when the killer doesnt look hard enough and no one ever gets seen.
But there are also the terrible ones where the killer is a heat seeking beast, hook camper, and no one gets generators.
Muy buen juego, engancha mucho, hacia tiempo que no encontraba uno asi.

I enjoyed this game quite a bit more before the update. Sure in theory it sounded like an excellent idea to match players and killers but the end result was far from an enjoyable one. I find myself to almost never be able to play as the killer because I have to wait for such a long period of time before a single person joins my lobby. I've resigned to only play as a survivor, which is fun in it's own right and there's almost no wait for that, but I'd like to hunt as well. Half of the fun is lost for me on this game. :( I hope they fix this. I miss playing as the killer so much. I'm iffy on the rate so it's neither positive nor negative. It's fun as long as I don't mind running away all the time.

This game is by far a very scary, very awesome, very fun game to play. I must say the game could use some work on the instances where the survivor can just hop back and forth over the fallen objects in order to occupy the time of the killer (and pretty much just troll the killer, as there's nothing you can do about it, at times), this is a bit unfair when playing; but other than that great all around game no doubt.

Great work devs, let's see even more awesome gamage with the updates and DLC. Cheers.

If you hate yourself, you can play this game. If you love your self and want to hate yourself, you can play this game. If you hate the world, you can play this game, at the end of the day you will hate yourself even more, GG, highly recommended.

When it comes to the genre, this is the best game there is, you will hear alot of whining, stating that killer or perk or addon is too OP. Ill admit there are certain points in this game that puts you at disavantage, like Survive with friends, no matter what Killer you play it will aways be hard to counter them.Game has some bugs, but what game doesnt this days?
There are also Killers that wipe the floor with survivors at Low ranks but are next to Bad when it comes to High ranks, example Freddy Kruger. while I love this killer from the movies (although they picked the wrong actor to make a model from)
He has a very hard time at high Ranks. If you see reviews saying hes too OP be sure more than half of those reviews are from people that complain about every change and dont want to adapt.Because he changes the game style compared to every other Killer

bu oyunda oyun lobileri-katil ile birlikte toplamda 5 kişiye kadar destekleniyor.Her oyuna başladığınızda farklı harita ile başlıyorsunuz.Böylelikle,bir haritada devamlı oynayarak oyundan bıkmamış oluyorsunuz.Oynıyabiliceğiniz 2 taraf var,hayatta kalanlar ve katil.Hayatta kalanların ana görevi harita içindeki 5 jeneratörü çalıştırıp.kaçış kapısına doğru koşarak onu açıp geçmek.tabii işler bu kadar kolay değil.eğer katilin kurduğu tuzağa yakalanırsanız,etrafınızda size yardım edebilecek bir takım arkadaşınız yoksa geçmiş olsun.İş katile gelince işiniz biraz zor trap ları kurmak adamların peşine koşarken öbür arkadaşı asılan arkadaşını kurtarır ve siz onları gene yakalamaya çalışırsınız 4 saklanan adamı yakalamak kolay değil.Benim şuana kadar oynadığım en iyi Hayatta Kalma Esaslı Korku oyunlarından biri size benim tavsiyem arkadaşlarınızla oynamak en zevklisi bu oyunu alanların bilgisayarıda biraz iyi olması gerekiyor ama emin olun pişman olmassınız.
